mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYPAGEFINANCE(LIKENO, USERNO, FINTYPE, PRTID) VALUES(LIKENO.NEXTVAL, ${userNo}, ${finType}, ${prtId})
mapper.select: SELECT inssvn_fin_prdt_nm, inssvn_kor_co_nm, intr_rate, intr_rate2 FROM MYPAGEFINANCE JOIN INSTLSAVING I ON I.INSSVN_ID = PRTID JOIN INSSVN_OPTION O ON O.INSSVN_ID = PRTID WHERE USERNO = ${userNo} AND PRTID = ${prtId}
